EN.value: The beauty of travel lies in its ability to awaken your senses. It's about getting to know new cultures, tasting exotic flavours, and admiring breathtaking landscapes. Don't miss out on those moments; book your deal now before it's gone... because if you don't go, you'll never know!
EN.referenceTranslation: The beauty of travel lies in its ability to awaken your senses. It's about getting to know new cultures, tasting exotic flavours, and admiring breathtaking landscapes. Don't miss out on those moments; book your deal now before it's gone... because if you don't go, you'll never know!

EN.value: Travel in style in Business Class
EN.referenceTranslation: Travel in style in Business Class

EN.value: Let us welcome you to Business Class. Our crew is standing by to take care of you while you sit back, relax and arrive well rested at your destination. Discover the privacy and comfort of our seats and enjoy the ever-changing menus created by Dutch top chefs. Are you ready to travel in style to your next destination? Explore all benefits of travelling in Business Class.
EN.referenceTranslation: Let us welcome you to Business Class. Our crew is standing by to take care of you while you sit back, relax and arrive well rested at your destination. Discover the privacy and comfort of our seats and enjoy the ever-changing menus created by Dutch top chefs. Are you ready to travel in style to your next destination? Explore all benefits of travelling in Business Class.

EN.value: Extra space and comfort may be within reach
EN.referenceTranslation: Extra space and comfort may be within reach

EN.value: Let us welcome you to our Premium Comfort Class. An additional class on our intercontinental flights that offers you more space and comfort. Plus, premium meals and beverages, SkyPriority service and other attractive travel perks at an enticing price.
EN.referenceTranslation: Let us welcome you to our Premium Comfort Class. An additional class on our intercontinental flights that offers you more space and comfort. Plus, premium meals and beverages, SkyPriority service and other attractive travel perks at an enticing price.

EN.value: Discover our KLM app, your one-stop solution for a seamless travel experience. Access travel documents and trip details, purchase tickets and manage your booking and Flying Blue account. Stay informed about any flight changes, and easily upgrade flights. But that's not all... uncover additional benefits!
EN.referenceTranslation: Discover our KLM app, your one-stop solution for a seamless travel experience. Access travel documents and trip details, purchase tickets and manage your booking and Flying Blue account. Stay informed about any flight changes, and easily upgrade flights. But that's not all... uncover additional benefits!

EN.value: Discover over 700 destinations worldwide. At KLM we always go the extra mile to make you feel welcome and completely at ease. We’ll make sure you’ll enjoy your flights with KLM and the flights or transfers with one of our airline partners. Let’s embrace new adventures, new business opportunities and new connections.
EN.referenceTranslation: Discover over 700 destinations worldwide. At KLM we always go the extra mile to make you feel welcome and completely at ease. We’ll make sure you’ll enjoy your flights with KLM and the flights or transfers with one of our airline partners. Let’s embrace new adventures, new business opportunities and new connections.
